channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Meta deal just turned this 175-year-old company into a linchpin of the AI data center boom
item.description: As hyperscalers race to wire ever-larger AI clusters, Corning is emerging as one of the most critical—and overlooked—suppliers in the stack.

item.title: This Startup Is Bringing Nvidia’s AI Tech Into the Operating Room
item.description: Artificial intelligence is scrubbing in and entering the OR. The goal is to collect insight and help doctors focus exclusively on care.

item.title: Dave Ramsey: Real Estate Is Not the Best Way to Earn Passive Income—Do This Instead
item.description: Real estate investments are not as passive as one might think says the finance expert.

item.title: This company pioneered virtual therapy for OCD. Now it wants to do the same for PTSD
item.description: When Stephen Smith started NOCD 11 years ago, he wanted to build an app for people like himself—one of the nearly 3 million Americans with obsessive-c...

item.title: ‘Cold call with me’: The new TikTok trend built on phone call awkwardness
item.description: Sales reps, business owners and recruiters are documenting their cold calls online and cashing in on the viral content. Cold calling has existed as lo...

item.title: OpenAI CFO Sarah Friar: There’s a ‘mismatch’ between AI’s abilities and the value companies are capturing
item.description: There’s a growing gap between AI's potential and how companies actually use it.

item.title: Experts warn that Trump’s use of AI images pushes new boundaries
item.description: The Trump administration has not shied away from sharing AI-generated imagery online , embracing cartoonlike visuals and memes and promoting them on o...

item.title: Why Amazon Is Ditching Amazon Go and Doubling Down on Whole Foods
item.description: Say goodbye to brick-and-mortar Amazon Go and Amazon Fresh stores.

item.title: TikTok settles youth social media addiction lawsuit ahead of trial
item.description: TikTok agreed to settle a landmark social media addiction lawsuit just before the trial kicked off, the plaintiff’s attorneys confirmed. The social vi...

item.title: Why TikTok Users Are Fleeing TikTok for a Hot New App Called UpScrolled
item.description: In the wake of TikTok’s ownership transition, users are souring on the vertical video platform, and turning to alternative apps.

item.title: Why investors and farmers are betting on organic agriculture
item.description: For decades, the discussion around organic farming has centered on important tenets of sustainability, environmental health, animal welfare, and a vis...

item.title: Before California, France tried a wealth tax. Macron repealed it after rich people fled the country instead of paying
item.description: A 20-year French experiment with a wealth tax ended with mixed results, but its removal created problems of its own.

item.title: A $975M Deal Will Turn This TikToker Into an AI‑Powered, Multilingual Content Machine
item.description: Khaby Lame is the most-followed user on the platform.

item.title: At Davos, CEOs said AI isn’t coming for jobs as fast as Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei thinks
item.description: The Anthropic CEO warns 50% of entry-level white collar jobs will be gone in five years. Other tech CEOs see that as unlikely.

item.title: UnitedHealth is reeling from a nearly 20% stock rout after warning investors about its first revenue decline in decades
item.description: "The company expects to return to growth in 2026," UnitedHealth said in May of last year. Today it revealed that it will take a bit longer.
